column2: 1. Which age category do you belong to?
column4: 3. What industry do you work in?

column8: 7. What was your companies stance on working remotely before the pandemic?
column9: 8. What do you see as the biggest benefit of working remotely?
column10: 9. What is the biggest issue you see with working remotely?
column11: 10. Please rate how strongly you agree or disagree with the following statements:
column12: 10.1.a. I could do my job just as effectively working from home.
column13: 10.2.a. I am able to stick to a work schedule.
column14: 10.3.a. I am expected to respond to emails/messages immediately.
column15: 10.4.a. My company provides me with the tools and software necessary to make remote working possible.
column16: 10.5.a. I get the enough support from my manager.
column17: 10.6.a. I am able to connect with my manager as well as if I was in the office.
column18: 10.7.a. I feel that I am able to easily reach my colleagues.
column19: 10.8.a. I feel that my colleagues keep me in the loop.
column20: 10.9.a. I am happy with how frequently I interact with colleagues.
column21: 10.10.a. I feel that the remote working policy is clear.
column22: 10.11.a. I know what is expected of me every day.
column24: 10.13.a. I am happy with my work-life balance.
column25: 10.14.a. I am happy with my ability to work from home.
column26: 11. Would you like to work remotely going forward?
